title: "Hey, DT! Mastodon SUCKS because of THIS!" (And Other Comments)

media:group.media:title: "Hey, DT! Mastodon SUCKS because of THIS!" (And Other Comments)
media:group.media:description:
On this edition of "Hey DT":

0:00 Intro
0:16 I know you like Mastodon but there is a HUGE downside... 
4:39 Your DTOS install script is now password protected; when will it be ready for public again?
6:47 What do you think makes Rust stand out from other programming languages?
7:12 When you have the terminal on screen, the youtube navigation bar makes it hard to see.
8:26 I would love to get the wallpaper from your main desktop. Great video btw!
9:03 I watched a video where you had a custom browser homepage with all those cool Linux links, Reddits for Linux etc. Could you PLEASE share that?
10:02 Have you thought about doing cyber security videos and do some ethical hacking related topics?
11:36  It appears Audacium and Tenacity have died. Is there another audio editing program you recommend?
13:48 Will you ever do a UNIX installation video?
18:07 Thanks to the Patrons.

REFERENCED:
► Mastodon.Technology Is Shutting Down - https://ashfurrow.com/blog/mastodon-technology-shutdown/
► The custom browser startpage from my older videos - https://gitlab.com/dwt1/dotfiles/-/tree/master/.surf
